greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = [x^n/n!] Sum_{k=0..n} cosh(k*x)^k.
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..220
formula: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} Sum_{j=0..k} binomial(k, j) * k^n * (k-2*j)^n / 2^k.  [Explicitly stating Vaclav's formula in Mma program - _Paul D. Hanna_, Oct 15 2018]
program: for(n=0, 20, print1(a(n), ", ")) \\ _Paul D. Hanna_, Oct 15 2018, using Vaclav's formula.
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 30 2014
ext: Name clarified by _Paul D. Hanna_, Oct 15 2018
